segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her, she's going to have a big mess to clean up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, creating a real disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the water on her feet yet, it's right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be really focused on those dishes, or maybe she's just ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone comes in and helps her before things get out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep flowing, and she's going to have a big mess to deal with.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like that, it must be a while.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her, she's going to have a lot of cleaning to do after this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
